Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. Otto Bathurst. Roel ReinÃ©. Debs Paterson. Craig Zisk. Jessica Lowrey.

Written by Steven Kane. Steven Kane. Steven Kane. Steven Kane. Kyle Killen. Kyle Killen. Kyle Killen. Kyle Killen. Justine Juel Gillmer. Silka Luisa. Richard Robbins.

Cast  Shabana Azmi( Admiral Margaret Parangosky ) . Natasha Culzac( Riz-028 ) . Olive Gray( Dr. Miranda Keyes ) . Yerin Ha( Kwan Ha ) . Bentley Kalu( Vannak-134 ) . Kate Kennedy( Kai-125 ) . Charlie Murphy( Makee ) . Danny Sapani( Captain Jacob Keyes ) . Jen Taylor( Cortana ) . Bokeem Woodbine( Soren-066 ) . Natascha McElhone( Dr. Catherine Halsey ) . Ryan McParland( Adun ) . Casper Knopf( Young John ) . Burn Gorman( Vinsher Grath ) . Duncan Pow( John’s Father ) . Hans Peterson( Ops Tech ) . Julian Bleach( Mercy ) . Sarah Ridgeway( John’s Mother ) . Karl Johnson( Truth ) . Fiona O’Shaughnessy( Laera ) . Hilton McRae( Regret ) . Claudius Peters( MP Malya ) . GÃ¡bor NagypÃ¡l( Squirrel ) .

Language English.

Producers Gian Paolo Varani. Michael Armbruster. Otto Bathurst. Robert Bernacchi. Howard Ellis. Justin Falvey. Darryl Frank. Justine Juel Gillmer. Bill Goddard. Adam Goodman. Sheila Hockin. Steven Kane. Charlotte Keating. Ian Keltie. Kyle Killen. Toby Leslie. Silka Luisa.

Production 343 Industries. Amblin Television. Chapter Eleven.

Creator Steven Kane. Kyle Killen.

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 17

Status OnGoing (2022–)
